Name: Kaveh
Title: "Empyrean Reflection" Kaveh
Desc: Knowledge of comprehension, benevolence, and aesthetics.
Source: Reward for inviting Kaveh to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

C117082.Name: Burst Scan
C117082.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Before either side chooses their action:</color> If your side has $[C116] or $[C112082], -1 to their $[K3], and $[K56] the card at the top of your deck. After this, deal $[K107] equal to the original Elemental Dice Cost of the card you $[K56]ed.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks)

C116.Name: Dendro Core
C116.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you deal $[K103] or $[K104] to an opposing active character, </color>DMG dealt +2.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color>

K103.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>
K103.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

K104.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>
K104.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C112082.Name: Bountiful Core
C112082.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 2 $[K107]\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack, max 3 stacks)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When you declare the end of your Round:</color> If this summon has at least 2 $[K3] remaining, deal 2 $[K107]. (Consumes $[K3])

K107.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>
K107.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C117081.Name: Mehrak's Assistance
C117081.Desc: The character's Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG, and the $[K100] they deal is converted to $[K107]. \n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses a Normal Attack:</color> Create a $[K1033].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

K1033.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Burst Scan</color>
K1033.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Before either side chooses their action:</color> If your side has Dendro Cores or Bountiful Cores, their <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> are decreased by 1, and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color> 1 card from the top of your deck. After this, deal {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color> equal to the Elemental Dice Cost of the <color=#FFFFFFFF>discarded</color> card.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages:</color> 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks)

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
